articles.author: Dakin Andone and Susannah Cullinane, CNN
articles.title: Omicron 'is going to take over' this winter, and Fauci says Americans should brace for a 'tough few weeks to months' - CNN
articles.description: The United States is likely in for a hard winter as the Omicron variant of Covid-19 spreads rapidly, Dr. Anthony Fauci says, straining a health care system already battered by the Delta variant.

articles.title: Wang Leehom’s divorce spat unites netizens from mainland China and Taiwan - South China Morning Post
articles.description: After the celebrity Taiwanese-American singer announced he was divorcing his wife, she publicly accused him of infidelity and other indiscretions.
